org.rakiura.cpn.event
Interface PlaceListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
CPNPlaceFigure, NetDrawing, PlaceAdapter, Transition
public interface PlaceListener
extends java.util.EventListener

Represents a Place event listener. This listener will be notified each time a token is added or removed from a place.

PlaceListener.java
Created: Thu Apr 11 15:44:50 2002

Since:
2.0
Version:
4.1.0 $Revision: 1.2 $
Author:
Mariusz Nowostawski

Method Summary
 void notify(PlaceEvent anEvent)
          Notifies the listener that the marking of the place has changed.
 void notify(TokensAddedEvent anEvent)
          Notifies the listener that the marking of the place has changed.
 void notify(TokensRemovedEvent anEvent)
          Notifies the listener that the marking of the place has changed.
 

Method Detail

notify

void notify(PlaceEvent anEvent)
Notifies the listener that the marking of the place has changed. It may be caused by either adding or removing a token from a Place.

Parameters:
anEvent - a PlaceEvent value

notify

void notify(TokensRemovedEvent anEvent)
Notifies the listener that the marking of the place has changed. It is fired when tokens are removed from the place.

Parameters:
anEvent - a TokensRemovedEvent value

notify

void notify(TokensAddedEvent anEvent)
Notifies the listener that the marking of the place has changed. It is fired when tokens are added to the place.

Parameters:
anEvent - a TokensAddedEvent value
